import '../../../CSS/Create.css' import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { isUserRegistered, editUser } from "../../../../../DataFunctions" export default function UserDetail(){ const params = useParams() const id = parseInt(params.userId) const user = isUserRegistered(id) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() editUser(id,e.target.name.value, e.target.apPat.value, e.target.apMat.value, e.target.password.value, e.target.email.value, e.target.superUser.checked ? 1 : 0) } return (

User Detail


) }
